page.title: 15INDUSTRY IN SKELMERSDALE
page.content: Stanley is the newest industrial area and only has 10 of the 18 units occupied.The National Bus Company has a depot here and there is also a Milk Depot.One of the largest companies is Rodco Ltd.which is a copperwire rolling mill.The town's electricity sub_station is sited on the Stanley estate. Westgate is the oldest and smallest industrial area and is situated in the heart of the old town.15 companies occupy small units there.Six of these are builders or builders' merchants. Most of these businesses were established when the New Town was being built.The Development Corporation had its offices and depot here until this year. There is a small unit of one_man workshops on a site at the top of Sandy Lane in addition to these areas.
